data.message: a load of rubbish, nothing working, hasn't been for a few days. I DO NOT THINK I WILL EVER BUY A MULTIPACK OF COKE AGAIN...

replies.message: Hi George, could you let us know what seems to be happening? Thanks

Whatever country I selected, the page just refreshes and you there is no indication why you can't proceed to enter a code. I'm not the only one who notice this. And this occurred in the competition time frame before the end of the 9th

Hi George, thanks for bringing this to our attention. Could you send us a private message with your email address along with the code you were trying to enter, so that we can look into this for you. Thanks
